Title: Requires that instruction in public schools aligned to the Culturally Responsive-Sustaining Education Framework
Summary: Requires instruction in public schools aligned to the Culturally Responsive-Sustaining Education Framework; requires the commissioner of education to update learning standards on an ongoing basis and provide technical assistance and resources to aid public schools in providing such instruction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring that instruction in public schools aligned to the Culturally Responsive-Sustaining Education Framework
